landing.title: Creating Materials with a Clear Purpose
landing.about:
Every material created for education matters.
With Materalist, you create presentations and study materials that are not just beautiful but also highly effective. Our goal is to make creation easier for you and help students understand the material better – whether during classes or for self-study.
Start creating today and become part of a community that's changing how we learn and teach.

about-us.subtitle: About Us
about-us.title: What Led to This Project
text:
My name is Matěj Cajthaml and I am a young teacher of technical subjects. From the very beginning of my teaching career, I felt that traditional ways of presenting material failed to truly engage students. Static slides full of text couldn’t deliver complex technical topics in a way that would genuinely foster understanding and active involvement.

Over the years, I tried many different tools – from traditional presentations to various interactive platforms and specialized educational systems. Each had its advantages but also its limitations. Some were too complicated, others too closed off and inflexible. I kept searching for something that would combine simplicity, interactivity, and creative freedom.

Out of these experiences and a constant drive to improve teaching, the idea to create my own platform was born. This idea became the foundation of my diploma thesis, where I started building the first version of an app that would allow anyone to easily create modern educational materials.

The goal was not to create just another ordinary presentation tool. I wanted to build a platform that supports creativity, learning, and sharing among teachers and students. A platform that grows with the community and thanks to the community.
And so, Materalist as you know it was born.

join.title: Join Us
join.text:
Joining Materalist means becoming part of a community that believes in better education. Whether you want to create your own materials, get inspired by others, or expand the platform with new ideas, our doors are open to you.

Materalist is completely free and always will be. We believe educational tools should be accessible to everyone without compromise. Join us, create, and help change the standards of education with us!
